message: You can't refuse this generous offer! Accept and we can both go home happy!
A fair start, but I'm not settling for that little. Be more generous!
A bit more generous, but still a good deal for me!
I'm not giving you the majority of the money. You'll have to do better than that!
Getting closer to a fair deal, but I'm still not giving up too much!
You're not getting away with the majority of the money that easily. Meet me in the middle!
